hal
  • Reference

Prediction method for the HAL SuperLearner wrapper

method for predict for SL.hal

Quick pass-through.

# S3 method for SL.hal
predict(object, newdata, bigDesign = FALSE, verbose = TRUE,
  chunks = 1000, s = ifelse(object$useMin, object$object$lambda.min,
  object$object$lambda.1se), ...)

# S3 method for SL.hal
predict(object, newdata, bigDesign = FALSE, verbose = TRUE,
  chunks = 1000, s = ifelse(object$useMin, object$object$lambda.min,
  object$object$lambda.1se), ...)

Arguments

object
A fitted object of class hal
newdata
A matrix of new predictions on which to obtain predictions
bigDesign
A boolean indicating whether to obtain predictions all at once (which may be memory intensive) or to split up the task into smaller chunks
chunks
A numeric indicating how many observations to use in each chunk of the prediction task (if bigDesign = FALSE)
...
Other arguments passed to predict

  • Arguments
